style.textcontent: body { font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #000000 0%, #0a0a0a 100%); color: #fff; } .section { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; background: #0a0f1e; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.9); padding: 30px; border: 1px solid #1f4068; color: #fff; } .section h2 { color: #00d9ff; } .section h3 { color: #ff3366; } .section p { color: #fff; } .demo-title { color: #ff3366; font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 10px; } .demo-box { background: #050510; border-left: 4px solid #ff3366; margin: 25px 0; border-radius: 3px; padding: 20px; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255,51,102,0.3); } .example-nest { margin: 18px 0; padding: 18px; background: #181a22; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid #00d9ff; } .code-block { background: #000; color: #fff; border-radius: 3px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; overflow-x: auto; margin: 15px 0; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 0.95em; min-height: 60px; line-height: 1.4; padding: 15px; border: 1px solid #00d9ff; } .output-box { background: #050510; border: 2px solid #00d9ff; border-radius: 3px; margin: 15px 0; min-height: 50px; padding: 15px; color: #fff; } button { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff3366 0%, #cc0033 100%); color: #fff; border: none; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 3px; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600; transition: all 0.3s ease; box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(255,51,102,0.4); } button:hover { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff5588 0%, #ff3366 100%); transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(255,51,102,0.6); }
